name: aslprep_fw
label: ASLPREP: A Robust Preprocessing Pipeline for ASL Data
description: ASLPREP is a robust and easy-to-use pipeline for preprocessing of diverse ASLASLP data.
author: PennLINC, University of Pennsylvania

freesurfer_input.description: zip outputs from a BIDS FreeSurfer gear. or from fmriprep/qsiprep

freesurfer_license.description: FreeSurfer license file, provided during registration with FreeSurfer. This file will by copied to the $FSHOME directory and used during execution of the Gear.

bids_filter_file.description: A JSON file describing custom BIDS input filters using PyBIDS. https://fmriprep.readthedocs.io/en/latest/faq.html#how-do-I-select-only-certain-files-to-be-input-to-fMRIPrep

save_outputs.description: Zip and save output directory contents on an algorithm failure. [default=false]

save_intermediate_work.description: Zip and save working directory with intermediate files. [default=false]

intermediate_files.description: Space separated list of FILES to retain from the intermediate work directory.

intermediate_folders.description: Space separated list of FOLDERS to retain from the intermediate work directory.

task_id.description: select a specific task to be processed

use_all_sessions.description: Use all sessions from this subject. [default=false]

fs_no_reconall.description: Use FreeSurfer to reconstruct surfaces from T1w/T2w structural images. If disabled, several steps in the fmriprep pipeline are added or replaced. [default=false]

ignore.description: Ignore selected aspects of the input dataset to disable corresponding parts of the workflow. Possible choices: fieldmaps, slicetiming [default='']

longitudinal.description: Treat dataset as longitudinal - may increase runtime [default=false]

output_spaces.description: Standard and non-standard spaces to resample anatomical and functional images to.  Standard spaces may be specified by the form ``<SPACE>[:cohort-<label>][:res-<resolution>][...]``, where ``<SPACE>`` is a keyword designating a spatial reference, and may be followed by optional, colon-separated parameters.  Non-standard spaces imply specific orientations and sampling grids. Important to note, the ``res-*`` modifier does not define the resolution used for the spatial normalization. To generate no BOLD outputs, use this option without specifying any spatial references. For further details, please check out https://fmriprep.readthedocs.io/en/latest/spaces.html

bold2t1w_dof.description: Degrees of freedom when registering BOLD to T1w images. 9 (rotation, translation, and scaling) is used by default to compensate for field inhomogeneities. Possible choices: 6, 9, 12. [default=9]

force_bbr.description: Always use boundary-based registration (no goodness-of-fit checks) [default=false]

force_no_bbr.description: Do not use boundary-based registration (no goodness-of-fit checks) [default=false]

dummy_scans.description: Number of non steady state volumes

skull_strip_template.description: Possible choices: OASIS30ANTs, NKI. select ANTs skull-stripping template (default: OASIS30ANTs))

skull_strip_fixed_seed.description: do not use a random seed for skull-stripping - will ensure run-to-run replicability when used with â€“omp-nthreads 1 [ default = false ]

fmap_bspline.description: fit a B-Spline field using least-squares (experimental)

fmap_no_demean.description: do not remove median (within mask) from fieldmap [ default = false ]

use_syn_sdc.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Use fieldmap-free distortion correction. [ default = false ]

force_syn.description: EXPERIMENTAL/TEMPORARY: Use SyN correction in addition to fieldmap correction, if available. [ default = false ]

cifti_output.description: output preprocessed BOLD as a CIFTI dense timeseries. Optionally, the number of grayordinate can be specified (e.g. 91k, equates to 2mm resolution)

medial_surface_nan.description: Replace medial wall values with NaNs on functional GIFTI files. Only performed for GIFTI files mapped to a freesurfer subject (fsaverage or fsnative). [default: false]

sloppy_mode.description: Use low-quality tools for speed - TESTING ONLY

no_track.description: Opt-out of sending tracking information of this run to the aslprep developers. This information helps to improve aslprep and provides an indicator of real world usage crucial for obtaining funding.

dummy_vols.description: Number of initial volumes to ignore  before cbf computation

smooth_kernel.description: Smoothing kernel for the M0 image(s)

timeout.description: Maximum number of days that fmriprep can run

sge-cpu.description: [SGE] How many cores to request. This is used for the underlying '-pe threaded' option.

sge-ram.description: [SGE] How much RAM to request. This is used for the underlying '-l h_vmem' option.

sge-short.description: [SGE] Tell the cluster this is a short job. This caps the job to 90 minutes wall-clock and 15 minutes of CPU.
